name: Moonlight Lullaby
desc4: When the equipper is a Support character and uses an <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</ct>, the DMG dealt by all squad members increases by 18% for 25s. Repeated triggers reset the duration. Passive effects of the same name do not stack.
story: A ballad adapted from a bedtime story, telling of a knight who rode beneath the moonlight. Through countless moonlit nights, its gentle melody still hums beneath the glow of the night light.
